short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open YouTube videos or playlists in a mini player in a new window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎥✨ Enjoy YouTube Like Never Before with Mini Player! 🎨

Looking for a smarter, more stylish way to watch your favorite YouTube videos or playlists? 

🎬 Say hello to YouTube Mini Player, the extension designed to make your YouTube experience effortless and fun! 🚀

🌟 Features You’ll Love:

📺 Mini Player Magic: Open YouTube videos or playlists in a sleek, floating mini-player for uninterrupted multitasking. No distractions, just pure entertainment! 💻+📱

🎨 Custom Colors: Personalize the mini-player’s look with our built-in color customization tool. Make it match your vibe! 🌈

🔔 Instant Access: Get started in seconds – just paste the link and click to open your video in style! ⏱️

💖 Optional Donations: Love this extension? Help support future updates and features by donating. Every bit counts! 🥰



Why Choose Mini Player?

🚫 No Ads or Tracking: Your privacy matters. We don’t track or show ads – it’s all about YOU. 🔒

⚡ Lightweight & Fast: Designed to be as light as a feather but powerful enough to elevate your YouTube experience. 🕊️💨

🌎 Globally Loved: Whether for work or play, enjoy YouTube in a whole new way – wherever you are! 🌏


How It Works: 

1️⃣ Copy your favorite YouTube video or playlist link.
2️⃣ Paste it into the extension’s input field.
3️⃣ Customize the player’s look and hit “Open Mini Player”! 🎯

💡 Get the best YouTube experience today – your way, your rules! Click “Add to Chrome” now and unlock a world of mini-player magic. ✨
